issue.title: [Rust] Improve performance of bool_equal
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11131](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11131). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems that the performance of `bool_equal` in `arrow/src/array/equal/boolean.rs`  can be improved somehow.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11131?focusedCommentId=17261845) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9124
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9124>
